) O O
 O O
BT O O
Openreach O O
is O O
responsible O O
for O O
looking O O
after O O
the O O
local O O
network O O
( O O

from O O
your O O

that O O

of O O

services O O
possible O O
. O O
BT O O
helps O O
to O O

provide O O

for O O
telephone O O
connection O O
. O O
It O O
has O O
products O O
like O O
PSTN O O
, O O
Ethernet O O
, O O
NGA O O
, O O
and O O
LLU O O
. O O
BT O O

provider O O
. O O
 O O
BT O O

is O O

module O O
which O O

BT O O
business O O

from O O

 O O

. O O
 O O

New O O
Accord O O
includes O O
several O O
methodologies O O
for O O
determining O O
a O O
bank O O
's O O
risk O O
- O O
based O O

 O O

for O O

) O O

 O O
( O O

 O O

Basel O O
II O O
Application O O
, O O
Basel O O
II O O
is O O
the O O
second O O
of O O
the O O
Basel O O
Accords O O
, O O
 O O
which O O
are O O
recommendations O O
on O O
banking O O
laws O O
and O O
regulations O O
issued O O
by O O
the O O
Basel O O
Committee O O
on O O
 O O
Banking O O
Supervision O O
. O O
The O O
purpose O O
of O O
Basel O O
II O O
, O O
which O O
was O O
initially O O
published O O
in O O
June O O
2004 O O
, O O
is O O
to O O
 O O
create O O
an O O
international O O
standard O O
that O O
banking O O
regulators O O
can O O
use O O
when O O
creating O O
regulations O O
about O O
 O O
how O O
much O O
capital O O
banks O O
need O O
to O O
put O O
aside O O
to O O
guard O O
against O O
the O O
types O O
of O O
financial O O
and O O
operational O O
 O O
risks O O
banks O O
face O O
. O O
In O O
practice O O
, O O
Basel O O
II O O
attempts O O
to O O
accomplish O O
this O O
by O O
setting O O
up O O
rigorous O O
risk O O
 O O
and O O
capital O O
management O O
requirements O O
designed O O
to O O
ensure O O
that O O
a O O
bank O O
holds O O
capital O O
reserves O O
 O O
appropriate O O
to O O
the O O
risk O O
the O O
bank O O
exposes O O
itself O O
to O O
through O O
its O O
lending O O
and O O
investment O O
practices O O
. O O
 O O
The O O
New O O
Accord O O
includes O O
several O O
methodologies O O
for O O
determining O O
a O O
bank O O
's O O
risk O O
- O O
based O O
capital O O
 O O
requirements O O
for O O
credit O O
, O O
market O O
and O O

risk O O
. O O
For O O

Based O O
Capital O O
( O O
RBC O O
) O O
, O O
Credit O O
Usage O O
 O O
( O O
CU O O
) O O
and O O
Stress O O
Test O O
( O O
ST O O
) O O
, O O
the O O
methodologies O O
that O O
will O O
be O O
used O O
for O O
repo O O
style O O
transactions O O
are O O
 O O
Simple O O
VaR O O
if O O
the O O
collateral O O
is O O
eligible O O
. O O
If O O

collateral O O
is O O
ineligible O O
then O O
the O O
Wholesale O O
loan O O
 O O
approach O O
will O O
be O O
utilized O O
or O O
the O O
collateral O O
will O O

reduced O O
to O O

in O O

Simple O O
VaR. O O
 O O
. O O

Project O O
: O O
Alert O O
messaging O O
is O O
the O O
process O O
of O O
reliably O O
and O O
securely O O
circulating O O
messages O O
associated O O
 O O
with O O
an O O
event O O
to O O
interested O O
users O O
. O O
Due O O
to O O
the O O
growth O O
of O O
Information O O
Technology O O
( O O
IT O O
) O O
and O O
 O O
telecommunications O O
sectors O O
in O O
the O O
recent O O
past O O
, O O
the O O
dissemination O O
of O O
alert O O
messages O O
has O O
become O O
 O O
prompt O O
and O O
easier O O
. O O
 O O
Since O O
the O O
existing O O
business O O
environment O O
faces O O
the O O
challenge O O
of O O
reaching O O
increasingly O O
segmented O O
 O O
markets O O
, O O
the O O
design O O
, O O
delivery O O
, O O
and O O
analysis O O
of O O
business O O
communications O O
needs O O
to O O
be O O
tightly O O
 O O
integrated O O
across O O
multiple O O
alert O O
notification O O
channels O O
. O O
Telecommunication O O
channels O O
through O O
 O O
which O O
subscribers O O
can O O
receive O O
alert O O
messages O O
may O O
include O O
email O O
, O O
fax O O
, O O
text O O
messaging O O
, O O
instant O O
 O O
messaging O O
, O O
broadband O O
network O O
and O O
the O O
like O O
. O O
Due O O
to O O
myriad O O
software O O
applications O O
implemented O O
by O O
 O O
businesses O O
and O O
the O O
vast O O
demographics O O
of O O
customers O O
, O O
it O O
may O O
become O O
necessary O O
to O O
segment O O
alert O O
 O O
messages O O
so O O
that O O
the O O
messages O O
can O O
be O O
sent O O
through O O
channels O O
based O O
on O O
business O O
needs O O
as O O
well O O
 O O
as O O
customer O O
preferences O O
. O O
Further O O
, O O
in O O
order O O
to O O
maintain O O
strong O O
customer O O
relationships O O
, O O
businesses O O
 O O
need O O
to O O
time O O
the O O
messages O O
precisely O O
. O O
This O O
brief O O
illustrates O O
how O O
Alert O O
Notification O O
System O O
( O O
IANS O O
) O O
 O O
can O O
help O O
organization O O
leverage O O
existing O O
infrastructure O O
to O O
better O O
service O O
their O O
customers O O
. O O
 O O
Achievements O O
: O O
 O O
• O O
Won O O
a O O
performance O O
certificates O O
and O O
given O O
a O O
bonus O O
for O O
outstanding O O
performance O O
 O O
• O O
Received O O
Onsite O O
opportunity O O
for O O
supporting O O
the O O
production O O
and O O
DR O O
environment O O
at O O
Saudi O O
Arabia O O
 O O
Responsibilities O O
: O O
 O O
• O O

of O O
the O O
application O O
, O O
Single O O
Point O O
of O O

. O O
 O O
• O O
Understood O O
and O O

for O O

Inbound O O

provided O O

. O O

• O O

testbed O O
setup O O

of O O
the O O

SMS O O

. O O

Struts O O
concept O O
 O O

system/ O O

element O O
( O O
machine O O
- O O
to O O
- O O
machine O O
) O O
interfaces O O
. O O

User O O

a O O
network O O
. O O

Project O O
: O O
Alert O O
messaging O O
is O O
the O O
process O O
of O O
reliably O O
and O O
securely O O
circulating O O
messages O O
associated O O
 O O
with O O
an O O
event O O
to O O
interested O O
users O O
. O O
Due O O
to O O
the O O
growth O O
of O O
Information O O
Technology O O
( O O
IT O O
) O O
and O O
 O O
telecommunications O O
sectors O O
in O O
the O O
recent O O
past O O
, O O
the O O
dissemination O O
of O O
alert O O
messages O O
has O O
become O O
 O O
prompt O O
and O O
easier O O
. O O
 O O
Since O O
the O O
existing O O
business O O
environment O O
faces O O
the O O
challenge O O
of O O
reaching O O
increasingly O O
segmented O O
 O O
markets O O
, O O
the O O
design O O
, O O
delivery O O
, O O
and O O
analysis O O
of O O
business O O
communications O O
needs O O
to O O
be O O
tightly O O
 O O
integrated O O
across O O
multiple O O
alert O O
notification O O
channels O O
. O O
Telecommunication O O
channels O O
through O O
 O O
which O O
subscribers O O
can O O
receive O O
alert O O
messages O O
may O O
include O O
email O O
, O O
fax O O
, O O
text O O
messaging O O
, O O
instant O O
 O O
messaging O O
, O O
broadband O O
network O O
and O O
the O O
like O O
. O O
Due O O
to O O
myriad O O
software O O
applications O O
implemented O O
by O O
 O O
businesses O O
and O O
the O O
vast O O
demographics O O
of O O
customers O O
, O O
it O O
may O O
become O O
necessary O O
to O O
segment O O
alert O O
 O O
messages O O
so O O
that O O
the O O
messages O O
can O O
be O O
sent O O
through O O
channels O O
based O O
on O O
business O O
needs O O
as O O
well O O
 O O
as O O
customer O O
preferences O O
. O O
Further O O
, O O
in O O
order O O
to O O
maintain O O
strong O O
customer O O
relationships O O
, O O
businesses O O
 O O
need O O
to O O
time O O
the O O
messages O O
precisely O O
. O O
This O O
brief O O
illustrates O O
how O O
Alert O O
Notification O O
System O O
( O O
IANS O O
) O O

can O O
help O O
organization O O

to O O
better O O
service O O
their O O
customers O O
. O O

. O O
 O O
Developed O O
Reverse O O
Auction O O
Engine O O
. O O
A O O
farmer O O
would O O

for O O
their O O

and O O

would O O

 O O
farmer O O

on O O

and O O
capacity O O
. O O
 O O
Developed O O
Palletization O O
engine O O
. O O
A O O
pallet O O
can O O
have O O
multiple O O
SKU O O
boxes O O
from O O
multiple O O
buyers O O
. O O

sequence O O
of O O
boxes O O
in O O

in O O

container O O
according O O
to O O

Project O O
02 O O
: O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
 O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
is O O
an O O
on O O
- O O
demand O O
, O O
Web O O
- O O
based O O
A O O
/ O O
P O O
application O O
that O O
will O O
be O O
implemented O O
to O O
 O O
automate O O
the O O
invoice O O
approval O O
and O O
payment O O
process O O
. O O
The O O
application O O
captures O O
vendor O O
/ O O
supplier O O
 O O
invoice O O
data O O
, O O
and O O
delivers O O
workflow O O
and O O
approval O O
capabilities O O
not O O
currently O O
implemented O O
in O O
the O O
 O O
SunSystems O O
AP O O
module O O
. O O
The O O
intent O O
is O O
to O O
decrease O O
potential O O
fraud O O
and O O
mistakes O O
, O O
while O O
increasing O O
 O O
control O O
, O O
compliance O O
and O O
visibility O O
into O O
invoice O O
payment O O
 O O
The O O
proposed O O
Concur O O
Invoicing O O
( O O
workflow O O
) O O
solution O O
should O O
accomplish O O
the O O
following O O
business O O
 O O
objectives O O
: O O
Automate O O
the O O
current O O
procure O O
- O O
to O O
- O O
pay O O
process O O
; O O
Deliver O O
an O O
online O O
solution O O
capable O O
 O O
of O O
providing O O
a O O
vehicle O O
for O O
employees O O
to O O
enter O O
invoices O O
, O O
route O O
them O O
for O O
approval O O
and O O
remind O O
 O O
approvers O O
when O O
time O O
has O O
elapsed O O
for O O
approval O O
; O O
Provide O O
a O O
workflow O O
whereby O O
Axis O O
management O O
 O O
can O O
approve O O
invoices O O
; O O
Allow O O
for O O
the O O
automatic O O
monitoring O O
of O O
policies O O
; O O
Provide O O
accounting O O
 O O
information O O
to O O
the O O
Sun O O
GL O O
for O O
all O O
A O O
/ O O
P O O
transactions O O
; O O
Monitor O O
compliance O O
to O O
corporate O O
policy O O
 O O
and O O
budget O O
guidelines O O
; O O
Improve O O
A O O
/ O O
P O O
process O O
efficiencies O O
( O O
as O O
compared O O
to O O
the O O
current O O
manual O O
 O O
process O O
) O O
; O O
Provide O O
the O O
creation O O
of O O
Purchase O O
Orders O O
for O O
the O O
Information O O
Technology O O
department O O
. O O
